highlights.headline: Nashville Predators vs. Pittsburgh Penguins: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Nashville Predators vs. Pittsburgh Penguins: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Nashville Predators vs. Pittsburgh Penguins: Game Highlights) 2025/11/16 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Sidney Crosby and Evgeni Malkin scored a little over two minutes apart in the first period to help the Pittsburgh Penguins beat the Nashville Predators 4-0 on Sunday to split their NHL’s Global Series in Sweden's capital.
headlines.shortLinkText: Crosby and Malkin score as the Penguins shut out the Predators 4-0 in Stockholm

video.headline: Nashville Predators vs. Pittsburgh Penguins: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Nashville Predators vs. Pittsburgh Penguins: Game Highlights) 2025/11/16 ESHEET

events.name: Vancouver Canucks at Tampa Bay Lightning

highlights.headline: Vancouver Canucks vs. Tampa Bay Lightning: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Vancouver Canucks vs. Tampa Bay Lightning: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Vancouver Canucks vs. Tampa Bay Lightning: Game Highlights) 2025/11/16 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Kiefer Sherwood, Linus Karlsson and Drew O’Connor scored in a 1:40 span in Vancouver’s five-goal third period and the Canucks overcame an early deficit to beat the Tampa Bay Lightning 6-2 on Sunday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Canucks score 5 3rd-period goals to beat Lightning 6-2 and end 3-game skid

video.headline: Vancouver Canucks vs. Tampa Bay Lightning: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Vancouver Canucks vs. Tampa Bay Lightning: Game Highlights) 2025/11/16 ESHEET

events.name: Vegas Golden Knights at Minnesota Wild

highlights.headline: Vegas Golden Knights vs. Minnesota Wild: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Vegas Golden Knights vs. Minnesota Wild: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Vegas Golden Knights vs. Minnesota Wild: Game Highlights) 2025/11/16 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Kirill Kaprizov scored on a one-timer from the right side on a power play at 4:50 of overtime to give the Minnesota Wild a 3-2 victory over the Vegas Golden Knights on Sunday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kaprizov scores on late OT power play to left Wild past Golden Knights, 3-2

video.headline: Vegas Golden Knights vs. Minnesota Wild: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Vegas Golden Knights vs. Minnesota Wild: Game Highlights) 2025/11/16 ESHEET

events.name: Detroit Red Wings at New York Rangers

highlights.description: Detroit Red Wings vs. New York Rangers: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Detroit Red Wings vs. New York Rangers: Game Highlights) 2025/11/17 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Lucas Raymond scored the tiebreaking goal late in the third period and the Detroit Red Wings beat the New York Rangers 2-1 on Sunday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Raymond scores tiebreaking goal in 3rd period as Red Wings beat Rangers 2-1

video.headline: Detroit Red Wings vs. New York Rangers: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (New York Islanders vs. Colorado Avalanche: Game Highlights) 2025/11/17 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Ross Colton and Victor Oloffson scored in a 1:19 span in the second period to help the streaking Colorado Avalanche beat the New York Islanders 4-1 on Sunday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Colton, Olofsson score 1:19 apart, streaking Avs beat Islanders 4-1
